Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b12) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b12

popup menus (long bookmarks list from the folder in bookmarks toolbar, firebug popup menu ) are not destructed when showed out of the firefox window.
After popup the part of menu in firefox window clearing, but another part (out of the window) is not destructed.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Resize FF window to 800*600
2. Have a long list of bookmarks in a folder on the bookmarks toolbar
3. Open this folder 
4. Close it
5. Have a parts of menu out of the window  
Actual Results:  
Have a parts of menu out of the window  

Expected Results:  
menu closed (cleared) after popuping

screenshot:
http://www.posmishka.com/tmp/2011-03-02_210604_cr.jpg

comments.text:
It would be great if you have the time to check older beta releases of Firefox 4 and check which version shows this problem for the first time. That would help us to narrow down the cause.

You can find the builds on the FTP server:
ftp://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/releases/

Btw. before you start please test with hardware acceleration disabled (see preferences | advanced).
